items.title: 苹果带镜片显示屏的智能眼镜或将具备两种模式 (原标题: Apple's Smart Glasses With In-Lens Display May Feature Two Modes)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果第二代智能眼镜：两种模式与竞争

## 核心功能与操作模式
*   苹果的第二代智能眼镜预计将配备**镜片内显示屏**。
*   根据彭博社马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，该眼镜可能具备**两种操作模式**，具体取决于其连接的设备：
    *   **连接Mac时：** 能够运行完整版的**visionOS操作系统**。
    *   **连接iPhone时：** 将切换到更**轻量级、更适合移动设备的界面**。
*   古尔曼在“Power On”时事通讯中透露了这一信息。

## 市场竞争
*   苹果的智能眼镜将直接与**Meta Ray-Bans**竞争。
*   Meta Ray-Bans目前已提供带镜片内显示屏的版本，在美国起售价为799美元。
*   ![Meta Ray Ban Glasses](https://images.macrumors.com/t/X79VgcjqvQfCtnyb020a6-gDlkM=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/Meta-Ray-Ban-Glasses.jpg?lossy)
    *   *图示：Meta Ray-Ban眼镜（不带镜片显示屏）*

## 第一代智能眼镜的展望
*   古尔曼此前曾表示，苹果的**第一代智能眼镜将不提供镜片内显示屏**。
*   第一代眼镜的预期功能包括：
    *   用于音乐播放的**扬声器**。
    *   用于拍照和录像的**摄像头**。
    *   **语音控制**功能。
    *   可能包含**健康功能**。
*   发布时间：古尔曼预计苹果可能最早在**2026年宣布第一代眼镜**，并于**2027年正式推出**。
items.shortSummary: 苹果第二代智能眼镜或将配备镜片内显示屏和两种操作模式。据马克·古尔曼透露，连接Mac时运行完整visionOS，连接iPhone时则使用轻量级界面。该产品将与Meta Ray-Bans竞争。古尔曼此前称，苹果第一代智能眼镜不含镜片显示屏，但具备扬声器、摄像头、语音控制及健康功能，预计2026年发布，2027年上市。
items.translated_title: 苹果带镜片显示屏的智能眼镜或将具备两种模式
items.content:
Apple's second-generation smart glasses with an in-lens display may have two modes, depending on which device they are connected to.

Meta Ray-Bans without an in-lens display

In his Power On newsletter today, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said he was told a future version of Apple's smart glasses may be able to run a full version of the visionOS operating system when they are paired with a Mac, and then switch to a more lightweight, mobile-friendly interface when they are paired with an iPhone.

Apple's smart glasses would compete with the Meta Ray-Bans, which are now available with an in-lens display (pricing starts at $799 in the United States). However, Gurman previously said Apple's first version of smart glasses will not offer an in-lens display.

Apple's first smart glasses will have speakers for music playback, cameras for photos and video, voice control, and potentially health features, according to Gurman.

He previously said Apple may announce the first-generation glasses as early as 2026, ahead of a 2027 launch.

Tags: Apple Glasses, Mark Gurman

This article, "Apple's Smart Glasses With In-Lens Display May Feature Two Modes" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 据报道，苹果正在研发新款 AirPods Pro、AirPods 5 和 H3 芯片 (原标题: Apple Reportedly Working on New AirPods Pro, AirPods 5, and H3 Chip)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果正在研发新款 AirPods Pro、AirPods 5 和 H3 芯片

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，苹果公司在发布 AirPods Pro 3 后，已着手开发下一代 AirPods 产品线，包括新款 AirPods Pro、AirPods 5 系列以及全新的 H3 芯片。

## AirPods Pro 发展

*   **新版本开发：** 苹果正在开发“高端入耳式耳机”的新版本。目前尚不清楚其具体命名，可能是 AirPods Pro 4，也可能是 AirPods Pro 3 的更新版本（类似于 AirPods Pro 2 曾更新 USB-C 充电盒但未改名）。古尔曼将其描述为“新版本”。
*   **硬件升级：** 分析师郭明錤（Ming-Chi Kuo）预测，明年的 AirPods Pro 将迎来“更显著”的硬件升级，可能包括至少一个微型红外摄像头。
*   **产品定位：** 一位微博爆料者称，这可能是一个更高配置的 AirPods Pro 3 选项，而非 AirPods Pro 4，类似于 AirPods 4 提供带和不带主动降噪的两种配置。

## H3 芯片

*   **新一代芯片：** 苹果正在开发用于无线音频的下一代 H3 芯片。
*   **性能提升：** 该芯片将带来音质改进和更低的延迟。
*   **应用前景：** H3 芯片很可能将搭载于下一代 AirPods Pro 中，但古尔曼并未明确指出其首发型号或发布时间。
*   **现有芯片：** 目前 AirPods Pro 3 和 AirPods 4 均配备 H2 芯片，而头戴式 AirPods Max 仍使用 H1 芯片。

## AirPods 5 系列

*   **双版本计划：** 苹果计划推出两个不同版本的 AirPods 5。
*   **健康功能：** 尽管 AirPods Pro 3 提供了运动心率监测，但古尔曼预计此功能不会扩展到 AirPods 5。不过，他表示苹果正为未来的 AirPods 规划多项新的健康功能，例如温度感应。

## AirPods 中的摄像头

*   **苹果考虑：** 古尔曼重申苹果正在考虑在至少部分 AirPods 型号中加入摄像头。
*   **功能设想：** 郭明錤此前曾表示，带有红外摄像头的 AirPods 将支持空中手势，并能实现 AirPods 与 Vision Pro 之间更深度的集成。

## AirPods Max 更新

*   郭明錤预测，新款 AirPods Max 将于 2027 年进入大规模生产。

![All AirPods 2025](https://images.macrumors.com/t/OB83_E5pQerwVdQMQAtoK_isbD0=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/All-AirPods-2025.png?lossy)

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Cool](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1af4XiY5l7MKT5h6GgPqIg0XEhQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Cool.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报道，苹果正积极开发新款 AirPods Pro、AirPods 5 系列以及下一代 H3 芯片。新款 AirPods Pro 可能带来显著硬件升级，包括红外摄像头。H3 芯片将提升音质并降低延迟。AirPods 5 将分两个版本，并有望加入温度感应等健康功能。苹果还在考虑为部分 AirPods 配备摄像头，以支持空中手势并增强与 Vision Pro 的集成。新款 AirPods Max 预计2027年量产。
items.translated_title: 据报道，苹果正在研发新款 AirPods Pro、AirPods 5 和 H3 芯片
items.content:
After releasing AirPods Pro 3 last month, Apple is already working on the next AirPods Pro, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


It is unclear if the new AirPods Pro would be branded as AirPods Pro 4, or if they would be considered an updated version of AirPods Pro 3. Gurman did not take a position, opting to describe them as a "new version" of the "high-end in-ear buds."

AirPods Pro 2 were updated with a USB-C charging case and a few other tweaks a year after they launched, without receiving a name change.

Last month, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo said the AirPods Pro would receive "more significant" hardware upgrades next year, including at least one tiny infrared camera. A leaker on Chinese platform Weibo subsequently claimed that these would be a higher-end AirPods Pro 3 option, rather than AirPods Pro 4. This would be similar to the standard AirPods 4, which are available in two configurations, with and without active noise cancellation.

In his Power On newsletter today, Gurman said Apple is developing its next-generation H3 chip for wireless audio, with improved sound quality and lower latency. It would make sense for this chip to be included in the next AirPods Pro, but Gurman did not explicitly mention which AirPods models the chip will debut in, or when.

Apple is also developing two tiers of AirPods 5, according to Gurman.

AirPods Pro 3 offer heart rate monitoring during workouts, but Gurman does not anticipate this feature extending to the AirPods 5. He said Apple is planning several new health features for future AirPods, though, such as temperature sensing.

Gurman reiterated that Apple is considering adding cameras to at least some AirPods models. Kuo previously said AirPods with infrared cameras would support in-air gestures, and enable deeper integration between AirPods and the Vision Pro.

AirPods Pro 3 and AirPods 4 are equipped with the H2 chip, which debuted in the AirPods Pro 2. The over-ear AirPods Max still have an H1 chip.

Kuo previously said new AirPods Max would enter mass production in 2027.

Related Roundups: AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 3
Tag: Mark Gurman
Buyer's Guide: AirPods (Neutral), AirPods Pro (Buy Now)
Related Forum: AirPods

This article, "Apple Reportedly Working on New AirPods Pro, AirPods 5, and H3 Chip" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 苹果预计“本周”发布两到三款产品 (原标题: Apple Expected to Announce These Two to Three Products 'This Week')
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果预计“本周”发布两到三款产品

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，苹果计划“本周”发布新产品。这些产品预计将通过新闻稿而非发布会的形式公布，并可能在YouTube上发布简短的宣传视频。考虑到美国哥伦布日和加拿大感恩节假期，发布时间可能会推迟到周二或之后。

## 预计更新产品

古尔曼在其“Power On”时事通讯中指出，本周将更新的产品包括：

*   **iPad Pro**
*   **Vision Pro**
*   **14英寸基础款MacBook Pro**

这三款产品都可能获得苹果下一代M5芯片的规格升级。

![苹果2024年10月Mac预告](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Z7pyGgWFJo7234K46p7bK4DgsMg=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/apple-oct-2024-mac-tease.jpg?lossy)
*苹果去年10月的“Mac Your Calendars”预告*

### iPad Pro

新款iPad Pro已在俄罗斯流出的开箱视频中曝光。

*   **芯片与内存**：确认搭载M5芯片，最低内存增至12GB。
*   **设计变化**：
    *   没有重大的设计改动。
    *   一个细微变化是设备背面不再刻有“iPad Pro”字样。
    *   此前有传闻称新款iPad Pro将配备两个前置摄像头，以便在纵向和横向模式下进行视频通话，但开箱视频中没有显示第二个前置摄像头，因此该传闻尚不明确。
*   **性能提升**：
    *   开箱视频中显示的Geekbench 6结果显示，M5芯片将继续采用9核CPU（3个性能核，6个效率核）。
    *   与当前iPad Pro中的M4芯片相比，M5芯片的多核CPU性能提升高达12%，GPU性能提升高达36%。

![2024款深空黑iPad Pro](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TIEfWmcRCITRmZ4RvSs_neWTCsE=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/iPad-Pro-2024-Space-Black.jpg?lossy)

### Vision Pro

更新版Vision Pro也预计将搭载M5芯片，尽管此前有传闻称将搭载M4芯片。

*   **芯片**：可能配备M5芯片，也可能包含用于改进输入处理的R2芯片，但R2芯片采用台积电2纳米工艺制造，预计要到明年下半年才会首次亮相。
*   **舒适度与颜色**：
    *   预计将随附更舒适的“双针织头带”（Dual Knit Band）。
    *   头显可能增加深空黑（Space Black）颜色选项。
*   **连接性**：根据错误公开的FCC文件，设备将继续支持Wi-Fi 6，而非Wi-Fi 6E或Wi-Fi 7。
*   **代际定位**：目前尚不清楚这些变化是否足以让苹果将其视为第二代Vision Pro。
*   **未来发展**：近期报告指出，苹果已暂停开发真正的下一代Vision Pro以及轻量低成本的“Vision Air”型号，转而专注于智能眼镜的研发。

![Vision Pro用户](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CcP-4-LpimNHg_Qdzp6ux5bP16s=/400x0/article-new/2023/09/Vision-Pro-Person.jpg?lossy)

### 14英寸MacBook Pro

古尔曼表示，搭载M5芯片的基础款14英寸MacBook Pro已“准备好发布”。

*   **发布顺序**：几天前，AppleInsider报道称，搭载M5芯片的基础款MacBook Pro将先于搭载M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的高端型号发布，后者预计将于2026年初推出。
*   **设计变化**：除了M5芯片，预计没有其他重大变化。
*   **未来展望**：MacBook Pro的重大更新预计将在两代之后的型号中出现，传闻中的升级包括OLED显示屏、触摸屏功能、更薄的设计、内置蜂窝连接以及采用台积电最新2纳米工艺制造的M6芯片，以实现更大的年度性能提升。

![M3 MacBook Pro深空黑](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6pnkS1I4DgiaeCEM4SE4vF9PNj0=/400x0/article-new/2023/10/m3-mbp-space-black.jpg?lossy)

## 其他产品路线图

古尔曼表示，新款Apple TV、HomePod mini和AirTag“仍在路线图上”，但他没有提供任何关于发布时间的更新。他还预计新款入门级iPad、iPad Air、Studio Display和MacBook Air型号，以及iPhone 17e，将于明年初推出。
items.shortSummary: 根据彭博社马克·古尔曼的报道，苹果预计“本周”通过新闻稿发布两到三款新产品，而非举办发布会。这些产品可能包括新款iPad Pro、Vision Pro以及基础款14英寸MacBook Pro，它们都将获得下一代M5芯片的性能升级。iPad Pro预计内存增加，性能显著提升；Vision Pro可能附带更舒适的头带并支持Wi-Fi 6；14英寸MacBook Pro除M5芯片外无重大设计变化。其他产品如Apple TV、HomePod mini等仍在规划中，预计明年初推出。
items.translated_title: 苹果预计“本周”发布两到三款产品
items.content:
Apple plans to announce new products "this week," according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.

Apple's "Mac Your Calendars" teaser last October

In his Power On newsletter today, Gurman said the products set to be updated this week include the iPad Pro, Vision Pro, and "likely" the base 14-inch MacBook Pro, with all three likely to receive a spec bump with Apple's next-generation M5 chip.

Gurman does not expect Apple to hold an event to announce these products. Instead, there will likely be a series of press releases on the Apple Newsroom website, and there might also be shorter promotional videos for each product on YouTube.

Monday is the Columbus Day holiday in the United States, and Thanksgiving in Canada, so we shall see if Apple holds its announcements until Tuesday or later.

iPad Pro



The next iPad Pro was already leaked in a pair of unboxing videos out of Russia. The videos confirmed that the device will be equipped with the M5 chip, and an increased minimum of 12GB of RAM, but no major design changes were visible.

There is one minor design change: "iPad Pro" is no longer inscribed on the back of the device.

It was previously rumored that the next iPad Pro models would be equipped with two front cameras, instead of one, making it easy to have video calls in both portrait and landscape orientations. However, there was no evidence of a second front camera in the unboxing videos out of Russia, so it is unclear if this rumor will pan out.

Geekbench 6 results shown in one of the unboxing videos revealed the M5 chip will stick with a 9-core CPU, with three performance cores and six efficiency cores. The results showed the M5 chip will offer up to 12% faster multi-core CPU performance, and up to 36% faster GPU performance, compared to the M4 chip in the current iPad Pro.

Vision Pro



An updated version of the Vision Pro is also expected to be equipped with an M5 chip, although an earlier rumor said the device would receive an M4 chip.

There could also be an R2 chip for improved input processing, but the report said that chip would be manufactured with TSMC's latest 2nm process, and Apple's first chips using that process are not expected to debut until the second half of next year.

Apple is expected to start including a more comfortable "Dual Knit Band" head strap in the box with the updated Vision Pro, and the headset could get a Space Black color option. The device will continue to support Wi-Fi 6, rather than Wi-Fi 6E or Wi-Fi 7, according to FCC documents that were erroneously made available for public viewing.

It is unclear if these changes will be enough for Apple to consider the updated Vision Pro to be a second-generation model. Recent reports have indicated that Apple has suspended development of a truly next-generation Vision Pro, along with a lightweight and lower-cost "Vision Air" model, as it focuses its efforts on smart glasses.

14-inch MacBook Pro



A base 14-inch MacBook Pro with an M5 chip is "ready for launch," according to Gurman.

A few days ago, AppleInsider reported that a base MacBook Pro with an M5 chip would be released before higher-end models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, which are expected to follow in early 2026. Beyond the M5 chip, no significant changes are expected.

Bigger changes to the MacBook Pro are expected with the two-generations-away models, with rumored upgrades including an OLED display, touchscreen capabilities, a thinner design, built-in cellular connectivity, and M6 chips manufactured with TSMC's latest 2nm process, for even greater year-over-year performance gains.

Other Products


New models of the Apple TV, HomePod mini, and AirTag are "still very much on the road map," according to Gurman, but he did not provide any update on timing.

He also expects new entry-level iPad, iPad Air, Studio Display, and MacBook Air models, along with an iPhone 17e, to launch early next year.

Related Roundups: Apple Vision Pro, iPad Pro, MacBook Pro
Tag: Mark Gurman
Buyer's Guide: Vision Pro (Don't Buy), iPad Pro (Don't Buy), MacBook Pro (Don't Buy)
Related Forums: Apple Vision Pro, MacBook Pro

This article, "Apple Expected to Announce These Two to Three Products 'This Week'" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: AT&T网站提及下一代配备M5芯片的iPad Pro (原标题: AT&T Website References Next-Generation iPad Pro With M5 Chip)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# AT&T网站泄露下一代iPad Pro信息

AT&T的网站在Google搜索结果中意外提及了一款未发布的、配备M5芯片的iPad Pro型号。目前尚不清楚这是否是一次意外泄露，或者仅仅是提前进行的搜索引擎优化（SEO）策略。

## 泄露详情

*   **HTML标题显示：** 在Google搜索结果中，AT&T网站上iPad页面的HTML标题显示为：“Shop Apple iPad Tablets: iPad Pro M5 Pre-Order Soon”。
*   **图片证据：**
    *   ![ipad pro 2024](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7rxyhqBCwKf7A_UN7EUtoGJebk8=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/ipad-pro-2024.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![ATT iPad Pro M5](https://images.macrumors.com/t/RaaH1FMMiTDCXMPf7hZaNfu5e84=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ATT-iPad-Pro-M5.jpg?lossy)

## 现状与意义

*   **产品列表：** 尽管AT&T的在线商店目前还没有M5芯片iPad Pro的产品列表，这使得此次发现并非实质性的产品发布。
*   **传闻印证：** 然而，这一信息与此前关于苹果即将发布下一代iPad Pro型号的传闻相符。
*   **发布预期：** 苹果预计最早将于本月更新iPad Pro，并为其配备M5芯片。
*   **早期泄露：** 该设备此前已在俄罗斯的两个早期开箱视频中泄露。
*   **传闻功能：** 曾有传闻称新设备将配备两个前置摄像头，但在开箱视频中没有发现此项改变的明显证据。
*   **设计方面：** 预计新一代iPad Pro不会有重大的设计变化。去年，iPad Pro更新了OLED显示屏并采用了更薄的设计。

## 相关背景信息

*   有传闻指出苹果可能在本月通过新闻稿发布多款新产品。
*   M5芯片预计将在2025-2026年期间逐步应用于Mac产品线。
items.shortSummary: AT&T网站在Google搜索结果中意外提及“iPad Pro M5”，暗示下一代iPad Pro将配备M5芯片。这可能是意外泄露或提前的SEO策略。尽管AT&T商店尚未上架，但此信息与苹果即将发布新iPad Pro的传闻吻合，预计本月更新。该设备此前已在开箱视频中泄露，但设计预计无重大变化。
items.translated_title: AT&T网站提及下一代配备M5芯片的iPad Pro
items.content:
AT&T's website references an unreleased iPad Pro model with an M5 chip, but it is unclear if it is an accidental leak, or simply a premature SEO play.


Here is how the HTML title for the iPad page on AT&T's website appears in Google search results:
Shop Apple iPad Tablets: iPad Pro M5 Pre-Order Soon
Here is a screenshot of the Google result:


The text might be changed quickly, now that it has received attention.

There are no product listings for an iPad Pro with an M5 chip on AT&T's online store, so this is ultimately not a substantial discovery. However, in line with rumors, it could signal that Apple is set to announce the next iPad Pro models soon.

Apple is expected to update the iPad Pro with an M5 chip as early as this month, and the entire device already leaked in two early unboxing videos out of Russia. It was also rumored that the device would be equipped with two front cameras, but there was no visible evidence of this change in the unboxing videos, so we shall see.

Last year, the iPad Pro was updated with an OLED display and a thinner design, but no major design changes are expected for the next models.
Related Roundup: iPad Pro
Buyer's Guide: iPad Pro (Don't Buy)

This article, "AT&T Website References Next-Generation iPad Pro With M5 Chip" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: 苹果正在为iPhone准备iOS 26.0.2更新 (原标题: Apple Preparing iOS 26.0.2 Update for iPhones)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iOS 26.0.2 更新概览

根据MacRumors的日志，苹果的软件工程师正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2。MacRumors日志一直是预测即将发布的iOS版本的可靠指标。

![iOS 26 Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

*   **更新目的**：iOS 26.0.2很可能是一个次要更新，旨在解决错误和/或安全漏洞。目前尚未公布具体细节。
*   **发布时间**：该更新预计将在未来几周内发布。

## iOS 26.0.1 修复内容回顾

上个月，苹果发布了iOS 26.0.1，其中包含了以下错误修复：

*   **Wi-Fi 和蓝牙连接问题**：iPhone 17、iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 型号可能偶尔出现Wi-Fi和蓝牙断开连接的问题。
*   **蜂窝网络连接问题**：少数iPhone用户在更新到iOS 26后可能无法连接到蜂窝网络。
*   **照片伪影**：在特定光照条件下使用iPhone 17、iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 型号拍摄的照片可能包含意外的伪影。
*   **应用图标显示异常**：添加自定义色调后，应用图标可能显示为空白。
*   **VoiceOver 禁用**：部分用户在更新到iOS 26后，VoiceOver功能可能被禁用。
*   **安全漏洞修复**：iOS 26.0.1还修补了一个安全漏洞。

## macOS 26.0.2 伴随更新

iOS 26.0.2的发布可能会伴随macOS 26.0.2。AppleInsider最近报道称，苹果一直在测试一款运行macOS 26.0.2的Mac新机型。该媒体认为，这款机型很可能是一款配备M5芯片的14英寸基础款MacBook Pro，预计将在配备M5 Pro和M5 Max芯片的高端14英寸和16英寸MacBook Pro机型之前发布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2更新，预计将在未来几周内发布，主要用于修复错误和/或安全漏洞。此前，iOS 26.0.1已修复了包括Wi-Fi/蓝牙断开、蜂窝网络连接、照片伪影、应用图标显示异常和VoiceOver禁用等问题，并修补了安全漏洞。macOS 26.0.2也可能随之发布，并与一款新的M5芯片MacBook Pro型号相关。
items.content:
Apple's software engineers are internally testing iOS 26.0.2, according to MacRumors logs, which have been a reliable indicator of upcoming iOS versions.


iOS 26.0.2 will likely be a minor update that addresses bugs and/or security vulnerabilities, but we do not know any specific details yet.

The update will likely be released within the next few weeks.

Last month, Apple released iOS 26.0.1, which includes the following bug fixes:
- Wi-Fi and Bluetooth may occasionally disconnect on iPhone 17, iPhone Air, and iPhone 17 Pro models
- A small number of iPhone users may be unable to connect to a cellular network after updating to iOS 26
- Photos taken under certain lighting conditions with iPhone 17, iPhone Air, and iPhone 17 Pro models may include unexpected artifacts
- App icons may appear blank after adding a custom tint
- VoiceOver may become disabled for some users after updating to iOS 26
iOS 26.0.1 also patched a security vulnerability.

macOS 26.0.2


iOS 26.0.2 could be accompanied by macOS 26.0.2.

AppleInsider recently reported that Apple has been testing an upcoming Mac model running macOS 26.0.2. The publication believes this model is likely a base 14-inch MacBook Pro with an M5 chip, which is expected to be released before higher-end 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pro models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26
Related Forum: iOS 26

This article, "Apple Preparing iOS 26.0.2 Update for iPhones" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: AirPods 4 以89美元的历史最低价发售 (原标题: AirPods 4 on Sale for All-Time Low Price of $89)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
# AirPods 4 历史最低价促销

亚马逊Prime会员大促虽已结束，但部分AirPods型号仍有超值优惠。

## 主要优惠亮点

*   **AirPods 4:** 售价仅为**89.00美元**，原价129.00美元，与该型号的历史最低价持平。
    ![AirPods 4 Prime Day Fall](https://images.macrumors.com/t/c_JQ8Yvp6cZtBmxqm9P6ObqlFkQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airpods-4-prime-day-fall.jpeg?lossy)
*   **带主动降噪功能的AirPods 4:** 售价**118.98美元**，原价179.00美元，同样创下历史新低。
*   **AirPods Pro 2:** 仅比其历史最低价高0.99美元，也有大幅折扣。
*   **AirPods Max (USB-C):** 目前也有不错的折扣。

## 其他信息

*   MacRumors是亚马逊的联盟伙伴，通过点击链接并购买，网站可能会收到少量佣金，以帮助维持运营。
*   读者可订阅优惠资讯邮件，或查阅专门的Apple Deals汇总，以获取本周所有苹果产品及相关配件的最佳折扣信息。
items.shortSummary: 亚马逊Prime会员大促结束后，AirPods系列产品仍有优惠。其中，AirPods 4以89美元（原价129美元）的历史最低价发售。带主动降噪功能的AirPods 4也降至118.98美元（原价179美元），同样创下历史新低。此外，AirPods Pro 2和AirPods Max (USB-C)也有显著折扣，AirPods Pro 2仅比其最低价高0.99美元。
items.translated_title: AirPods 4 以89美元的历史最低价发售
items.content:
Amazon Prime Big Deal Days may be over, but we're still tracking great deals on a few AirPods models. The highlight is the AirPods 4 for $89.00, down from $129.00, which is a match of the all-time low price on this model.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Amazon. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

If you're searching for the AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancelation, Amazon has this model on sale for $118.98, down from $179.00, which is another best-ever price. There are also solid discounts on both the AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods Max (USB-C) right now, with the AirPods Pro 2 just 99 cents off of their lowest-ever price.
